resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/2095358438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>2095358438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5006</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Feeling Thermometer</string>
            <string language="es">Termómetro de sensaciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Teirmiméadar Mothúchán</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühl Thermometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thermomètre de Sentiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termômetro Do Sentimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Termometro Di Sensibilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αίσθημα του θερμομέτρου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students brainstorm in small groups about the things that make them feel angry. These are discussed and the idea of the "feeling thermometer" is introduced.</string>
            <string language="es">Una exposición de ideas de los estudiantes, que trabajarán en pequeños grupos, sobre las cosas que les hacen enfadar. Éstas se exponen y se introduce la idea de “termómetro de sensaciones”.</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaoiníonn na daltaí i ngrúpaí beaga faoi na rudaí a chuireann fearg orthu. Cuirtear coincheap an “teirmiméadar mothúchán” os a gcomhair.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer lösen in den kleinen Gruppen 
über die Sachen gedanklich, die sie Gefühl verärgert bilden. 
Diese werden behandelt und die Idee des "Gefühl Thermometers" 
wird eingeführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants font un brainstorm dans de petits 
groupes au sujet des choses qui rendent leur la sensation fâchée. 
Ceux-ci sont discutés et l'idée du "thermomètre de sentiment"
est présentée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes brainstorm em grupos pequenos sobre
as coisas que fazem lhes a sensação irritada. Estes são 
discutidos e a idéia do "do termômetro sentimento" é introduzida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi brainstorm nei piccoli gruppi circa 
le cose che rendono loro il tatto arrabbiato. Questi sono 
discussi e l'idea "del termometro di sensibilità" è introdotta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταιγισμός ιδεών σπουδαστών στις μικρές ομάδες για 
τα πράγματα που τους κάνουνη την αίσθηση. Αυτοί συζητούνται
και η ιδέα του "αισθήματος του θερμομέτρου" εισάγεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
